Title: Colossal Youth
Actors: Ventura, Vanda Duarte, Beatriz Duarte, Gustavo Sumpta
Plot: After the Portuguese government demolishes his slum and relocates him to a housing project on the outskirts of Lisbon, 75-year-old Cape Verde immigrant Ventura wanders between his new and old homes, reconnecting with people from his past. (from Wikipedia)
